PageTitle: reset qos-profile statistics vni source peer
FuncDef: The reset qos-profile statistics vni source peer command deletes statistics about a QoS profile on a specified NVE interface.
CLIs: reset qos-profile statistics vni <vni-id> { inbound | outbound } source <sourceip> peer <peerip>

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the inbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies the outbound direction of an interface.
-

Specifies the IPv4 address of the source.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the IPv4 address of the peer.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a VNI ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 16777215.

Examples: <HUAWEI> reset qos-profile statistics vni 1 inbound source 1.1.1.1 peer 1.1.1.2
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To delete statistics about a QoS profile on a NVE interface, such as statistics about HQoS queues and CAR, run the reset qos-profile statistics command.
